pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, November 25, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will appear before the Public Order Emergency Commission.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media interested in covering the event can contact Michael.Tansey@poec-cedu.gc.ca for details.
  • The event will be streamed live via the following link: https://publicorderemergencycommission.ca/public-hearings
